verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <S%H5329><s%> To the chief Musician עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> above הַגִּתִּ֗ית <S%H1665><s%> upon Gittith מִזְמ֥וֹר <S%H4210><s%> A Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> of David יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD אֲדֹנֵ֗ינוּ <S%H113><s%> our Lord מָֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> How אַדִּ֣יר <S%H117><s%> how excellent שִׁ֭מְךָ <S%H8034><s%> [is] thy name בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in all the earth אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> Who תְּנָ֥ה <S%H5414><s%> who hast set ה֝וֹדְךָ֗ <S%H1935><s%> thy glory עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> above הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <S%H8064><s%> above the heavens

מִפִּ֤י <S%H6310><s%> Out of the mouth עֽוֹלְלִ֨ים ׀ <S%H5768><s%> of babes וְֽיֹנְקִים֮ <S%H3243><s%> and sucklings יִסַּ֪דְתָּ֫ <S%H3245><s%> hast thou ordained עֹ֥ז <S%H5797><s%> strength לְמַ֥עַן <S%H4616><s%> Because צוֹרְרֶ֑יךָ <S%H6887><s%> because of thine enemies לְהַשְׁבִּ֥ית <S%H7673><s%> that thou mightest still א֝וֹיֵ֗ב <S%H341><s%> the enemy וּמִתְנַקֵּֽם׃ <S%H5358><s%> and the avenger

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> When אֶרְאֶ֣ה <S%H7200><s%> When I consider שָׁ֭מֶיךָ <S%H8064><s%> thy heavens מַעֲשֵׂ֣י <S%H4639><s%> the work אֶצְבְּעֹתֶ֑יךָ <S%H676><s%> of thy fingers יָרֵ֥חַ <S%H3394><s%> the moon וְ֝כוֹכָבִ֗ים <S%H3556><s%> and the stars אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which כּוֹנָֽנְתָּה׃ <S%H3559><s%> which thou hast ordained

מָֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> What אֱנ֥וֹשׁ <S%H582><s%> What is man כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that תִזְכְּרֶ֑נּוּ <S%H2142><s%> that thou art mindful וּבֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> of him? and the son אָ֝דָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> of man כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> that תִפְקְדֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H6485><s%> that thou visitest

וַתְּחַסְּרֵ֣הוּ <S%H2637><s%> lower מְּ֭עַט <S%H4592><s%> For thou hast made him a little מֵאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> than the angels וְכָב֖וֹד <S%H3519><s%> him with glory וְהָדָ֣ר <S%H1926><s%> and honour תְּעַטְּרֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H5849><s%> and hast crowned

תַּ֭מְשִׁילֵהוּ <S%H4910><s%> Thou madest him to have dominion בְּמַעֲשֵׂ֣י <S%H4639><s%> over the works יָדֶ֑יךָ <S%H3027><s%> of thy hands כֹּ֝ל <S%H3605><s%> all שַׁ֣תָּה <S%H7896><s%> thou hast put תַֽחַת־ <S%H8478><s%> under רַגְלָֽיו׃ <S%H7272><s%> all [things] under his feet

צֹנֶ֣ה <S%H6792><s%> All sheep וַאֲלָפִ֣ים <S%H504><s%> and oxen כֻּלָּ֑ם <S%H3605><s%> All וְ֝גַ֗ם <S%H1571><s%> and also בַּהֲמ֥וֹת <S%H929><s%> yea and the beasts שָׂדָֽי׃ <S%H7704><s%> of the field

צִפּ֣וֹר <S%H6833><s%> The fowl שָׁ֭מַיִם <S%H8064><s%> of the air וּדְגֵ֣י <S%H1709><s%> and the fish הַיָּ֑ם <S%H3220><s%> of the sea עֹ֝בֵ֗ר <S%H5674><s%> [and whatsoever] passeth through אָרְח֥וֹת <S%H734><s%> the paths יַמִּֽים׃ <S%H3220><s%> of the seas

יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD אֲדֹנֵ֑ינוּ <S%H113><s%> our Lord מָֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> How אַדִּ֥יר <S%H117><s%> how excellent שִׁ֝מְךָ֗ <S%H8034><s%> [is] thy name בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> in all the earth
